CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT
2. PDCTBT
3. Se°°°Se (although this is a chemical structure, it is relevant to the discussion of the material properties)

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PCDSeBT
2. PDCTBT

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. The third entity, Se°°°Se, is a chemical structure and not a material name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

1. "full width at half maximum"
2. "PCDSeBT"
3. "155 nm"
4. "PDCTBT"
5. "140 nm"
6. "J SC value"

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or characteristics that are being described or compared in the text.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "full width at half maximum"
2. "PCDSeBT"
3. "PDCTBT"
4. "J SC value"

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or characteristics that are directly related to the materials being discussed in the text. The other entities are either units of measurement or a general characteristic that is not specific to any material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| full width at half maximum |
| PCDSeBT |
| PDCTBT |
| J SC value |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

1. "the full width at half - maximum (fwhm) of PCDSeBT (155 nm)" - Here, "the full width at half-maximum" is a property, and its value is given as "155 nm" for PCDSeBT.
2. "that of PDCTBT (140 nm)" - Here, "the full width at half-maximum" is a property, and its value is given as "140 nm" for PDCTBT.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "155 nm" and "140 nm".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 155 nm
2. 140 nm

These are the entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
